sentences.en: Concentrators in geological sciences elect either geology or geography.
sentences.cn: 主修地质学的学生要选修地质学或地理课程.

sentences.en: History and geography have conspired to bring Greece to a moment of decision.
sentences.cn: 历史和地理因素共同将希腊推至作出抉择的紧要关头。

sentences.en: I shall confine myself to the subject of geography.
I still haven't done my geography homework.
sentences.cn: 我还没做完地理科家庭作业呢。

sentences.en: In the past, the region had been protected by its forbidding geography and the extremities of its climate.
sentences.cn: 过去，这个地区令人生畏的地理条件和极端的天气状况使它受到保护。

sentences.en: Try to correlate your knowledge of history with your knowledge of geography.
sentences.cn: 试着把你的历史知识和地理知识联系起来.

sentences.en: We use a globe in our geography class.
sentences.cn: 我们在地理课上使用地球仪.

sentences.en: We're familiar with the geography of New England.
sentences.cn: 我们熟悉新英格兰的地形.

sentences.en: We're unfamiliar to the geography of New England.
sentences.cn: 我们不熟悉新英格兰的地形.

sentences.en: Why are Geography, Drama, Art and English in the ascendant?
sentences.cn: 为什么地理、戏剧、艺术和英语逐渐受宠？

phrases.tran_cn: 地理系；地理学系；地理学
民族地理学；国家地理杂志

trans.tran_en: the study of the countries, oceans, rivers, mountains, cities etc of the world
